name: get_distance_by_city_state_country
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool great_circle_math_api.
Tool description: An api to perform mileage calculations by receiving location information.
API description: Retrieves the latitude, longitude, and calculated distance in miles between two locations specified by city, state, and country.

country1.description: The country of the first location.

country2.description: The country of the second location.

state2.description: The state of the second location.

city2.description: The city of the second location.

city1.description: The city of the first location.

state1.description: The state of the first location.
